item.description:
Facility Decision Making: Grasp the Facts First
When: Wednesday, January 26 from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m.
Where: MassBio
One Cambridge Center, 9th Floor
Cambridge, MA
Website: http://www.massbio.or...
You need to make your prospective new space work for your company. Before even looking at new properties or considering an expansion, life sciences companies must first understand their facility needs. Join MassBio for a discussion among experts in the field, from civil engineering to design to construction, who will offer lessons and guidance that will enable you to enter into your next facility decision with confidence rather than peril. This seminar will feature a case study from a userâ€™s perspective and touch all of the bases from building the right facilities team to pre-programming, cost containment, due diligence, and energy modeling.
item.name: Facility Decision Making: Grasp the Facts First
